name: Chicken Blaster (itch)
description:
Ready. Aim. Fire!!

Shoot the coins to collect points and special awards while trying to not shoot the Blue and Red balloons. 

The coins and balloons spawn faster and faster the longer you play, making the game harder as you go. 

There are 10 different rooms to play in and are chosen  at random when you start the game. 

If you hate the room or the music, just restart  the game and you will be in a new room with a new look and new tunes to stomp your foot too, or slap your knee for some good ole Ham-bonin' times. 

Enjoy the spooky graveyard

Ride the waves or a pirate ship.

The closest thing to a bar fight in this game.

Taking the fight to the streets. 

This is a casual game meant to make you laugh.

This game will be available for IOS and Android in the near future.
